title: Evaluation of User Satisfaction of Electronic Medical Record System at RSI Sultan Agung Semarang
details: L Rizqulloh, M Iqbal, D Kurniawati - Window of Health: Jurnal Kesehatan, 2025
abstract: Abstract From 2019 to 2022, RSI Sultan Agung Semarang managed SIMRS independently. While the implementation remained hybrid, SIMRS was turned over to a third party in early 2023 to develop Electronic Medical Records (EMR). However …
